backend/main.mo: Main backend canister handling user profiles, role checks, location updates, SOS alerts, and authorization via access control mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old SOS alert structures to new ones by adding a targetPolice field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping recent feature changes to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling authentication, profile setup, and routing to ambulance or police interfaces.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing attribution and visual branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, user info, share link controls, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Dialog component explaining the app's shareable link and custom domain setup.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen guiding users to authenticate via Internet Identity with role-themed visuals.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for creating a user profile with name and role selection, submitting via mutation and handling errors.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: Component providing a button to copy the app’s share URL with clipboard fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, and exposing login and logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, location updates, SOS alerts, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes and emergency color scheme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main entry that initializes React, wraps the app with query and identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance UI page handling live geolocation, periodic location updates, and SOS activation/deactivation synced with backend.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: React page that tracks police geolocation, plays sounds for new SOS alerts, filters ambulance locations by freshness, and periodically sends police location updates.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Returns the full current browser URL including origin, path, query, and hash.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash/query parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requirements, and planned SOS targeting updates for nearest police alerting.
